entry.title: [ERI1][Cooling System] - Rack ERI0113A03B maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 7, 2026, 07:00 - 17:00 UTC

Nov 28, 00:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.
